name: Baby Rescue - Fun Arcade
description:
Baby Rescue is a fun fly-your-chopper action/adventure game where you have ONE mission: save all the babies from the scariest places known to mankind!

Ever wonder where all these babies came from? You'll find out after saving all of them

Featuring 10 stages, leaderboards, Facebook and Twitter integration, and plenty of cute babies : )

REVIEWS:
---------------------------------
It has a good approach with bright and colorful graphics, and can be addictive some times - Appmodo

Become a fan of Baby Rescue on Facebook!
Our Website- http://babyrescue.kooapps.com/

A note from our producer:
---------------------------------
Inspired by many chopper/helicopter games, we asked ourselves- "what do we really really want to save" and the answer was simple- "cute babies". Come join us!
